mapper.sql: ORDERNO, ID, ORG_CODE, SUBORG_CODE, INPUTDATE, SHIPDATE, SALETYPE, SALEMODE, CUSTOMER_ID, SETTLEMODE_ID, INVOICE, ISRUSH, WAREHOUSE_ID, INPUTTYPE, EMP_ID, REMARK, STATUS, TOTALAMOUNT, TOTALQTY, ORDERLINES, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME, MODIFYUSER, MODIFYTIME, RTOTALAMOUNT, RTOTALQTY, INVOICEPRINTFLAG, DELIVERFLAG, SETTLEMENTFLAG, PRIVILEGEFLAG, WHETHERPRINT, BEEPPAGER, OTHERKEY
mapper.select: select count(*) as id,decode(sum(totalamount),null,0,sum(totalamount)) as rtotalamount,decode(sum(totalqty),null,0,sum(totalqty)) as rtotalqty from T_SALE_ORDER_HEAD where trunc(shipdate) = to_date('${orderdate}','yyyy-mm-dd')
select count(*) as cnt from t_sale_order_line line where line.orderno in (select orderno from t_sale_order_head where trunc(shipdate) = to_date('${orderdate}','yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.insert: insert into T_SALE_ORDER_HEAD (ORDERNO, ID, ORG_CODE, SUBORG_CODE, INPUTDATE, SHIPDATE, SALETYPE, SALEMODE, CUSTOMER_ID, SETTLEMODE_ID, INVOICE, ISRUSH, WAREHOUSE_ID, INPUTTYPE, EMP_ID, REMARK, STATUS, TOTALAMOUNT, TOTALQTY, ORDERLINES, CREATEUSER, CREATETIME, MODIFYUSER, MODIFYTIME, RTOTALAMOUNT, RTOTALQTY, INVOICEPRINTFLAG, DELIVERFLAG, SETTLEMENTFLAG, PRIVILEGEFLAG, WHETHERPRINT, BEEPPAGER, OTHERKEY ) values (#{orderno,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{suborgCode,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shipdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{saletype,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{salemode,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settlemodeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoice,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{isrush,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inputtype,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderlines,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rtotalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rtotalqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceprintflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliverflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{settlementflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{privilegeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{whetherprint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beeppager,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{otherkey,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update T_SALE_ORDER_HEAD
ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=OTHER},
SUBORG_CODE = #{suborgCode,jdbcType=OTHER},
INPUTDATE = #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHIPDATE = #{shipdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SALETYPE = #{saletype,jdbcType=OTHER},
SALEMODE = #{salemode,jdbcType=OTHER},
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLEMODE_ID = #{settlemodeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVOICE = #{invoice,jdbcType=OTHER},
ISRUSH = #{isrush,jdbcType=OTHER},
WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INPUTTYPE = #{inputtype,jdbcType=OTHER},
EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=OTHER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTALAMOUNT = #{totalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTALQTY = #{totalqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDERLINES = #{orderlines,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=OTHER},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=OTHER},
MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RTOTALAMOUNT = #{rtotalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTOTALQTY = #{rtotalqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVOICEPRINTFLAG = #{invoiceprintflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVERFLAG = #{deliverflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETTLEMENTFLAG = #{settlementflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRIVILEGEFLAG = #{privilegeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHETHERPRINT = #{whetherprint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BEEPPAGER = #{beeppager,jdbcType=OTHER},
OTHERKEY = #{otherkey,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ORDERNO = #{orderno,jdbcType=OTHER}

update T_SALE_ORDER_HEAD set ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=OTHER}, SUBORG_CODE = #{suborgCode,jdbcType=OTHER}, INPUTDATE = #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SHIPDATE = #{shipdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SALETYPE = #{saletype,jdbcType=OTHER}, SALEMODE = #{salemode,jdbcType=OTHER}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLEMODE_ID = #{settlemodeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVOICE = #{invoice,jdbcType=OTHER}, ISRUSH = #{isrush,jdbcType=OTHER}, WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INPUTTYPE = #{inputtype,jdbcType=OTHER}, EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=OTHER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTALAMOUNT = #{totalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTALQTY = #{totalqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDERLINES = #{orderlines,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RTOTALAMOUNT = #{rtotalamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTOTALQTY = #{rtotalqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVOICEPRINTFLAG = #{invoiceprintflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERFLAG = #{deliverflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETTLEMENTFLAG = #{settlementflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIVILEGEFLAG = #{privilegeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHETHERPRINT = #{whetherprint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BEEPPAGER = #{beeppager,jdbcType=OTHER}, OTHERKEY = #{otherkey,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ORDERNO = #{orderno,jdbcType=OTHER}
